languages.text: "Напрасно вы послушали Калькасара. Он использовал вас для темного дела".
"You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."
languages.original_text: "Напрасно вы послушали Калькасара. Он использовал вас для темного дела".

traits.locale_text: "You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."
"You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."
"You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."
"You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."
"You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."
"You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."

languages.text: “你们当时不该听从卡尔卡扎的命令，他利用你们做了邪恶的事情。”
languages.original_text: "You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."

traits.locale_text: “你们当时不该听从卡尔卡扎的命令，他利用你们做了邪恶的事情。”

languages.text: « Vous avez eu tort d'obéir à Calcazar. Il s'est servi de vous pour commettre un acte indigne. »
languages.original_text: "You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez eu tort d'obéir à Calcazar. Il s'est servi de vous pour commettre un acte indigne. »

languages.text: 「カルカサルに従ったのは間違いだった。奴はお前を暗黒の行為のために利用したんだ」
languages.original_text: "You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."

traits.locale_text: 「カルカサルに従ったのは間違いだった。奴はお前を暗黒の行為のために利用したんだ」

languages.text: «Cometiste un error obedeciendo a Calcazar. Le usó para materializar sus malas intenciones».
languages.original_text: "You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."

traits.locale_text: «Cometiste un error obedeciendo a Calcazar. Le usó para materializar sus malas intenciones».

languages.text: "Es war falsch, dass Ihr Calcazar gehorcht habt. Er hat Euch genutzt, um eine dunkle Tat zu verüben."
languages.original_text: "You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."

traits.locale_text: "Es war falsch, dass Ihr Calcazar gehorcht habt. Er hat Euch genutzt, um eine dunkle Tat zu verüben."

languages.text: "Calcazar'a itaat etmeniz bir hataydı. Art niyetli planlarında sizi de maşa olarak kullandı."
languages.original_text: "You were wrong to obey Calcazar. He used you to commit a dark deed."
